articles.title: Kim Yong Nam to Visit South Africa and Zimbabwe
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam to Visit South Africa and Zimbabwe
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, will soon visit South Africa to attend the inaugural ceremony of the President of the country.
					 He will also visit Zimbabwe.

articles.title: Delegation of KPA Political Officers Leaves for Vietnam
articles.content:
Delegation of KPA Political Officers Leaves for Vietnam
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of political officers of the Korean People's Army led by Kim Jong Gak, first vice director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, left here Tuesday to visit Vietnam.

articles.title: 24th National Scientific and Technological Festival Closes
articles.content:
24th National Scientific and Technological Festival Closes
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The 24th national scientific and technological festival which was opened on April 22 closed with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition on Tuesday.
					 The festival was held, divided into 21 panels including metal, electric, coal, railway transport, machine, construction and building materials, agricultural production, light industry, biology and chemistry.
					
					 Scientists, technicians, working people and officials presented more than 680 data of successful researches and introduction conducive to solving scientific and technological problems arising in the building of an economic power.
					
					 The participants in the festival widely exchanged significant scientific and technological successes and experience in strengthening the Juche character of the national economy, stepping up the drive to put it on modern and IT basis and developing the IT, Nano technology and biological engineering, core basic technologies.
					
					 Five participants in the festival won best prizes and 58 participants received prizes for the first place.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, O Su Yong, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Yong Jin, minister of Education, Pyon Yong Rip, president of the State Academy of Sciences, and others.
					
					 Choe Sang Gon, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea, made a closing speech at the ceremony.

articles.title: Night View of Wonsan
articles.content:
Night View of Wonsan
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The night view of Wonsan, a modern port city of Korea, is spectacular.
					 Apartment houses, public buildings and public service facilities in the city have been decorated with lights and illuminations recently.
					
					 The dwelling houses and public buildings adorned with line bulbs and near and far floodlights look like a big peacock with its wings spread.
					
					 The roofs of apartments lit brighter by floodlights in close distance depict the upper parts of the wings of the peacock.
					
					 The peacock which has turned into decorative lights, fascinated by the scene of the city becoming more beautiful as the days go by, gives an impression of its being aboard a swaying big ship. The graceful features of the Songdowon and Tongmyong Hotels with their mysterious light pillars planted deep in the sea remind the viewers of passenger cabins and the chandeliers and fireworks-like lamps in the Haean Square of a specially ornamented mast.
					
					 Jangdok Islet in the sea off Wonsan is crowded with people enjoying the night view.
					
					 Wedding ceremonies in the night view, evening galas at the Haean Square and angling on the pier decorated with line bulbs are new sceneries which came into being along with the night view.
					
					 The fantastic night view decorated with electricity produced by the Wonsan Youth Power Station is one more socialist fairyland in the Songun era.

articles.title: Italian Food Restaurant
articles.content:
Italian Food Restaurant
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- There is a restaurant specializing in Italian dishes in Kwangbok Street, Pyongyang.
					 Its main dishes are various kinds of pizza and spaghetti dishes including pizza margherita and spaghetti vongole bianco. It also serves famous Korean and foreign dishes.
					
					 Manager of the restaurant Kim Sang Sun told KCNA:
					
					There is a moving story behind the appearance of this restaurant.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il took care that a restaurant specializing in Italian dishes was opened, saying the Koreans should be let to taste world- famous dishes.
					
					He took necessary measures, learning that the restaurant found it a tough row to hoe, having no cook experienced in Italian dishes.
					
					Now our cooks are just as good as Italians in making Italian dishes.
					
					No wonder the Korean and foreign customers are satisfied with the famous dishes of the world served by our restaurant.

articles.title: KCNA Rebukes Japan's Moves to Go Nuclear
articles.content:
KCNA Rebukes Japan's Moves to Go Nuclear
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries have become all the more undisguised in their moves to go nuclear.
					 Former Minister of Finance Nakagawa blustered on April 5 and 19 that "it would be better to hold discussion on nuclear weapons" and "nuclear weapons can be coped with in kind only."
					
					 The recently released book "How strong 'SDF'" says that "the most effective means for becoming a self-reliant country is to go nuclear."
					
					 An operation to bring approximately 1.8 tons of nuclear substance from France is already underway. 
					
					 This indicates that the militarist tendency guided by the theory that "a country should have access to nukes to become a militarily ordinary country" prevails in the Japanese society and that the Japanese reactionaries' moves for nuclear weaponization have entered the phase of full implementation.
					
					 Japan is a war criminal state whose possession of the three services and capability to fight a war and belligerency is banned. However, this country has persistently sought arrogant wild ambition to have access to nukes, not content with just denying "the Pacifist Constitution."
					
					 In the mid-1950s Japan introduced nuclear technology from the U.S. to massively build nuclear facilities at home. In 1967 when it made public "three non-nuclear principles" it kicked off basic researches into the country's own nuclear policy and in 1969 it worked out a clandestine document calling for "Japan's possession of the capability for manufacturing nuclear weapons." Since 1995 it has conducted study into nuclear weaponization in real earnest.
					
					In fact, by the mid-1970s Japan was capable of manufacturing nuclear weapons in just three months. At present it has a potential strong enough to manufacture more than 1,000 nuclear bombs in just a few weeks, once it has a will.
					
					 Japan has reached such a level that it can rival world military powers in terms of the technology for manufacturing nuclear weapons, the technology for developing their carrier means and stockpiling of nuclear substance. It has all conditions necessary for producing nuclear weapons in the shortest possible time.
					
					 This was evidenced by the remarks made by Ozawa who was the leader of the Liberal Party as of April 2002 that "Japan was capable of making thousands of nuclear bombs if it has a will."
					
					 Japan's moves to go nuclear are directly related to the Japanese reactionaries' scenario for aggression as they are keen to turn their country into a military giant in a bid to launch overseas expansion and reinvasion. 
					
					 Japan has channeled major efforts into building strong military muscle as evidenced by the massive production of combat equipment, launch of satellites for military purposes and introduction of a missile defense system, etc.
					
					ã€€Japan has stepped up the moves to equip the SDF with sophisticated and ultra-modern weapons in full gear, assuming offensive nature as they are aimed at radically  increasing its  maneuverability and striking capability and operational capability on the ground and in the sea and in the air. 
					
					 Having become fully capable of fighting a war in terms of the strength of the ground, maritime and air SDFs and their technical equipment, Japan is now talking about having access to nukes. This is designed to realize its old dream of the "Greater East-Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" by launching reinvasion with nukes.
					
					 The Japanese militarists think that Japan suffered a defeat in the war because it did not have nuclear weapons.
					
					 Obsessed by extreme revanchism to revenge the defeat and ambition for overseas expansion, the Japanese reactionaries have pushed forward nuclear weaponization by hook or by crook for years to attain their purpose.
					
					 Having technology and means necessary for manufacturing nuclear weapons, Japan can launch reinvasion any time aboard a nuclear war chariot.
					
					 Japan pushed ahead with its "Nishina programme" for the production of nuclear weapons to realize its nuclear ambition already during the Second World War. Its nuclear war maniacs are now raising a hue and cry over "threats" from someone. This is nothing but a ridiculous and foolish ploy to justify its nuclear weaponization before the international community.
					
					 The Japanese militarists' persistent moves for the nuclear weaponization, a threat to the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Asia, would only compel the army and people of the DPRK to further bolster the nuclear deterrent for self-defense to protect the global peace and stability.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Urged to Drop Their Ambition to Stage Comeback to Korea
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Urged to Drop Their Ambition to Stage Comeback to Korea
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK will never allow the reckless provocations of the Japanese reactionaries against the DPRK but deal merciless retaliatory blows at them should they dare infringe upon its sovereignty even a bit. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday warns this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on: 
					
					 Recently the Japanese authorities decided to apply unilateral sanctions against the DPRK, malignantly slandering its satellite launch. They are becoming increasingly vocal in calling for "a preemptive attack on the DPRK." This is a blatant challenge and provocation to the DPRK as it is nothing but a reckless behavior of those obsessed with hostility towards the DPRK and ambition for reinvasion of Korea.
					
					 Lurking behind the above-said decision of the Japanese reactionaries is a sinister intention to abuse the issue of the Korean Peninsula to fish in the troubled waters politically. 
					
					 Their decision is also designed to lead the DPRK-Japan relations of confrontation to an extreme phase and secure a pretext for starting a new war on the peninsula. 
					
					 Their talk about "attack on the enemy's base" is aimed at realizing the above-mentioned scenario. By "attack on the enemy's base" they mean striking the DPRK.
					
					 The moves of the Japanese reactionaries to embark upon the road of staging a comeback to Korea under the pretext of what they called "threat" have gone beyond the limit, posing an unprecedentedly undisguised and potential danger. 
					
					 Their theory of "attack on the enemy's base" precisely means a theory of war of reinvasion against Korea. The Japanese militarists are keen to realize the above-said scenario through a reckless preemptive attack.
					
					 Japan is the sworn enemy of the Korean people. The army and people of the DPRK will surely force the Japanese reactionaries to pay dearly for their hideous crimes against the DPRK. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to drop at once their hostility towards the DPRK and give up the ambition for reinvasion.

articles.title: Reckless Remarks of S. Korean Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade Lambasted
articles.content:
Reckless Remarks of S. Korean Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade Lambasted
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Ryu Myung Hwan, minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of south Korea, at a recent news conference and briefing blustered that if the north operates the reprocessing facilities, it will face a strong countermeasure of the international community. He went lengths of making grave threatening remarks that not only the UN but south Korea and the United States would take corresponding steps. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: His barbed words can never be overlooked as they are nothing but treacherous outbursts let loose by a wicked confrontation-minded element, prompted by his extreme idolization of outsiders, deep-seated rejection and hostility toward fellow countrymen.
					
					 It continues:
					
					 He groundlessly took issue with the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes which was conducted as required by international law and betrayed his bitterness toward fellow countrymen in collusion with foreign forces. This only lays bare once again the black-hearted true colors of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors who are utterly indifferent to the nation and the destiny of fellow countrymen as it is steeped in the idea of totally depending on outsiders and hysteric confrontation with fellow countrymen to the marrow of its bones. 
					
					 Ryu is taking the lead in the anti-DPRK racket of "sanctions" and "pressure" kicked up by the Lee regime in league with outsiders, while persistently crying out for cooperating with them. This clearly proves that he is a warhawk bereft of reason.  
					
					 He also uttered this or that about the issue of the Kaesong Industrial Zone. This betrayed his inveterate concept of confrontation with fellow countrymen aimed to thwart the settlement of the national issue in collusion with foreign forces and bring the inter-Korean relations to an uncontrollable catastrophe. The spiritless traitor is not entitled to handle the issue of the inter-Korean relations as he considers foreign forces more important than compatriots.  
					
					 The DPRK is keeping strict tabs on the daily rash acts perpetrated by Ryu betraying the nation and escalating the inter-Korean confrontation and will surely force the traitors to face the stern judgment of history.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Pro-Reunification Organization under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Pro-Reunification Organization under Fire
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) released a statement on Apr. 24 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for suppressing the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration.
					 The statement accused the judicial authorities of sentencing leading members of the solidarity to prison terms on Apr. 21 after labeling it an "organization benefiting the enemy." 
					
					 This repressive action taken by them against the solidarity in the wake of the one taken against it last year shows part of the acts of treachery and submission of the judicial authorities hell-bent on flunkeyism and subservient to the dictatorial power, it held.
					
					 Recalling that the solidarity has struggled against the sycophant traitors hell-bent on pro-Japanese and pro-U.S. acts and the dictators suppressing the people with clubs, the statement demanded the Lee dictatorial regime lift at once the label attached to the organization of the reunification movement, declare all those detained not guilty and set them free. 
					
					 The statement declared that the South Headquarters of Pomminryon would firmly join hands with all the organizations and personages desirous of reunification and wage a struggle for decisively frustrating the reckless moves of the Lee Myung Bak dictatorial regime to escalate the confrontation and defending and implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: DPRK's April Holidays Celebrated
articles.content:
DPRK's April Holidays Celebrated
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Bulgaria, Italy and Myanmar in the period between April 1 and 20 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 16th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the 77th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 Vasilka Nikiforova, chief of the Kim Il Sung Library in Bulgaria, said that the army and people of the DPRK have achieved only successes in the efforts to build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation, holding high the banner of Songun despite the moves of the imperialists to stifle them under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Constanzi Franco, secretary general of the Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il and the invincible revolutionary armed forces the Korean people have achieved great successes in their efforts to build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation and the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, confident of victory and optimistic about future.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Myanmar.
					
					 Meanwhile, meetings, seminars, remembrance meetings, briefings, film shows and a photo exhibition took place in Laos, Indonesia and Thailand from April 6 to 10 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.  
					
					 Displayed in the venue of photo exhibition were photographs showing the exploits performed by the President. 
					
					 Participants of film shows watched "The International Friendship Exhibition House" and other Korean films.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam visitara Sudafrica y Zimbabwe
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam visitara Sudafrica y Zimbabwe
  Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, realizara pronto una visita a la Republica Sudafricana para participar en la ceremonia de toma de posesion del presidente de este pais.
					  Tambien el visitara la Republica de Zimbabwe.

articles.title: Clausurado XXIV Festival Nacional de Ciencia y Tecnica
articles.content:
Clausurado XXIV Festival Nacional de Ciencia y Tecnica
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ATCC) -- Quedo clausurado este martes en la Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones el XXIV Festival Nacional de Ciencia y Tecnica, que habia sido inaugurado el dia 22.
					 Este evento transcurrio dividido en 21 secciones como las de metalurgia, industria electrica, industria carbonifera, transporte ferroviario, maquinaria, construccion y sus materiales, agricultura, industria ligera, biologia, quimica, etc.
					
					  Los cientificos, tecnicos, trabajadores y funcionarios participantes en el presente festival exhibieron mas de 680 exitos de investigacion y aplicacion logrados en sus trabajos para resolver los problemas cientifico-tecnicos surgidos en la construccion de una potencia economica.
					
					  Tambien fueron intercambiados ampliamente los exitos y experiencias cientifico-tecnicos de mucha importancia para fortalecer el caracter jucheano de la economia nacional, acelerar la modernizacion e informatizacion y desarrollar las ciencias basicas medulares como la informatica, nanotecnologia y biotecnologia.
					
					  En el certamen, 5 participantes ocuparon el lugar especial y otros 58, el primer lugar.
					
					  En la ceremonia de clausura estuvieron presentes el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, el vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros O Su Yong, el ministro de Educacion Kim Yong Jin, el presidente de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias Pyon Yong Rip y otros funcionarios.
					
					  El vicepresidente del CC de la Federacion General de Ciencias y Tecnicas de Corea, Choe Sang Gon, pronuncio la palabra de clausura.

articles.title: Paisaje nocturno de la ciudad de Wonsan
articles.content:
Paisaje nocturno de la ciudad de Wonsan
  Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ATCC) -- El paisaje nocturno de Wonsan, ciudad portuaria y cultural de Corea es un mundo fascinante al pie de la letra.
					  En los ultimos tiempos, los apartamentos, edificios publicos y redes de servicio de la ciudad fueron adornados nuevamente por los bombillos electricos en alambre y las proyecciones de luz  de cercana y larga distancias describiendo un gran pavo real que abrio sus alas.
					
					   Las luces de techos de los apartamentos que se ven mas claras por proyecciones de luz cercana describen la parte superior de alas del pavo real.
					
					  El pajaro convertido en luz tras ser encantado por el aspecto de la ciudad cada dia mas hermosa parece como si estuviera cargado en un barco bailador.
					
					 Los hoteles Sondowon y Tongmyong, que enclavan pilares maravillosos en la profundidad del mar y muestran sus figuras elegantes, asimilan al camarote de un gran barco de pasajeros; las tipicas aranas y las lamparas de salvas, que iluminan la Plaza Haean, hacen recordar a un mastil vanidoso.
					
					  La isla Jangdok situada en el mar frente a Wonsan esta repleta de los espectadores para ver tal paisaje.
					
					  Se destacan las bodas en medio del paisaje nocturno, el juego nocturno en la Plaza Haean, la pesca de hombres en el embarcadero especificamente adornado de bombillos electricos en alambre y otros aspectos.
					
					  Tal paisaje nocturno engendrado por beneficios de la Central Electrica Juventud de Wonsan es un paisaje socialista dado por la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar).

articles.title: ATCC comenta las acciones de Japon que amenazan al mundo
articles.content:
ATCC comenta las acciones de Japon que amenazan al mundo
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ATCC) -- Se tornan cada dia mas abiertas las maniobras de los reaccionarios japoneses para pertrecharse con armas nucleares.
					  El ex ministro japones de Finanzas Nakagawa dijo los dias 5 y 19 que "seria mejor debatir sobre las armas nucleares" y "es posible hacer frente a las armas nucleares solo con las mismas".
					
					En el recien publicado libro "Hasta donde llega el poderio de las 'Fuerzas de Autodefensa'?" se lee el fragmento: "el armamento nuclear deviene el medio mas eficiente para ser un pais independiente".
					
					  Japon inicio tambien la operacion para introducir desde Francia cerca de 1.8 toneladas de sustancias nucleares.
					
					  Esto demuestra que toda la sociedad japonesa esta contagiada con la teoria militarista de que "hay que poseer sin falta las armas nucleares" para ser un "Estado militar normal" y que entraron en la etapa crucial las maniobras de los reaccionarios japoneses para adquirir los artefactos de ese tipo.
					
					  Aunque Japon es pais criminal de guerra al que esta prohibido poseer las fuerzas armadas terrestres, maritimas y aereas y otras facultades belicas y el derecho a la beligerancia, el no rehusa simplemente la "constitucion pacifista" sino abriga en todo tiempo la injustisima ambicion de equiparse con armas nucleares.
					
					 A mediados de la decada de 1950, Japon construyo en gran medida los establecimientos nucleares en el territorio nacional introduciendo las tecnicas de la rama de EE.UU. Y en 1967 cuando publico paradojicamente los "tres principios de la desnuclearizacion", inicio el estudio basico sobre su propia politica nuclear y elaboro dos anos despues el documento secreto sobre la "posesion de la capacidad de fabricar el arma nuclear". 
					
					 A partir de 1995, dio acicate a la investigacion del armamento nuclear.
					
					  Realmente, a mediados de la decada de 1970, Japon adquirio la capacidad de fabricar dentro de tres meses las armas nucleares y ahora tiene la potencialidad de fabricar mas de mil bombas nucleares en cuestion de semanas cuando le de la gana.
					
					  Son comparables con las potencias militares del mundo la tecnologia de fabricacion de armas nucleares, la de desarrollo de los medios de transporte y el almacenamiento de sustancias nucleares de ese pais isleno.
					
					  En ese contexto, en abril de 2002, el entonces lider del Partido Liberal, Ozawa, declaro que Japon "puede fabricar miles de bombas atomicas cuando lo decida".
					
					  El armamento nuclear de Japon esta relacionado directamente con la ambicion de los reaccionarios japoneses de convertir a su pais en una potencia militar para lanzarse a la expansion a ultramar y a la nueva agresion.
					
					  Anteriormente, Japon ha venido prestando primordial atencion a la preparacion del gran poderio militar incluso la produccion en gran cantidad de los equipos belicos, el lanzamiento de satelite militar y la introduccion del sistema antimisiles.
					
					  Se realizaron adquiriendo el caracter ofensivo la modernizacion y la tecnificacion de punta de los armamentos para elevar al maximo la capacidad de golpe movil y de operacion de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" en la tierra, el mar y el cielo.
					
					  Insatisfecho de la perfecta capacidad de ejecutar la guerra de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" terrestres, maritimas y aereas y de los equipos tecnicos, Japon aboga por poseer hasta las armas nucleares partiendo de su objetivo de tomar el camino de nueva agresion con estos artefactos para lograr su antiguo sueno de la "Esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia oriental".
					
					  Los militaristas japoneses buscan la causa de la derrota en la Segunda Guerra Mundial en la falta de esos medios de exterminio masivo.
					
					  De ahi que los reaccionarios japoneses, cautivados por el extremado revanchismo y el expansionismo a ultramar, vinieron impulsando de una u otra forma el armamentismo nuclear durante largo tiempo.
					
					 Es una cuestion de tiempo el inicio de la reagresion con armas nucleares por Japon.
					
					 Ya en el periodo de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, los imperialistas japoneses fanaticos por las armas nucleares habian impulsado el "Programa Nishina" sobre la produccion de las mismas y actuan demencialmente de siglo a siglo con el mismo proposito.
					
					  Sin embargo, estan cuestionando descaradamente ahora la supuesta "amenaza" de alguien.
					
					  Esta accion ridicula y estupida es para justificar ante la sociedad internacional sus maniobras para dotarse de artefactos nucleares.
					
					  Si los militaristas japoneses recurren de continuo al armamentismo nuclear amenazando a la Peninsula Coreana  y el resto de Asia, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea fortaleceran su disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa para salvaguardar la paz y la estabilidad del mundo.
